name: Rainbow Racing!
description:
NOTICE: THE MUSIC MIGHT NOT WORK IN THE WEB VERSION OF THE GAME :(

Instructions: Use W, A, S and D to control your car, stay on the color of your skittle to go faster, try to win at all costs!!

Criteria:

1-Kart Racer: the fastest karts in the galaxy!

2-Skittles: Taste the rainbow and race on it, too!!

3-Anatomically Incorrect: Those skittle sure look too damn big to be edible!

4-Chiptune: Dip into a rainbow of beautiful 8-bit melody with this exhilarating soundtrack!

Credits:

-Song by user bariq18 on opengameart.com

-Kart model by jailtonblender on free3d.com

Track, Logo, buttons, programming and art design by me!
